Summary: Biochemical reaction from ponatinib to n-oxide ponatinib. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from ponatinib to n-desmethyl ponatinib. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4, CYP2C8, CYP3A5 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from ponatinib to ponatinib M14.
Transport from ponatinib to ponatinib. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCG2 or ABCB1.
